== Booking #ubuntu-meeting For Your Team Meeting ==

If you need to book #ubuntu-meeting, first check that the time and date you want does not already have a session booked. See http://fridge.ubuntu.com/calendar for a complete list of events.

If the slot that you want is free, add your meeting to the Fridge calendar. You can do this by sending an email to ubuntu-news-team AT lists DOT ubuntu DOT com asking for an event to be added. Include the following information in your email:

* Your team name
* Single linesummary of the event
* Date of the event
* Time in the UTC timezone

Your event should added shortly.
